items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.

items.content_html: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

items.content_html: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.
items.title: OpCodeWolf/rss-api-server: This RSS-API-Server is a Node.js-based API server built with TypeScript. It provides various endpoints for managing RSS feeds and user authentication, utilizing SQLite for data storage. The server is designed to be lightweight and efficient, making it suitable for integration with various applications.

items.content_html: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
items.title: RyomenDev/google-oauth-kit: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
